author: Omkar Godbole
title: Nasdaq Futures Chalk Out Golden Cross Near Record High, Offering Bullish Cues to Bitcoin
description: Nasdaq and bitcoin often move together, suggesting the golden cross could encourage bitcoin bulls.
content:
E-mini Nasdaq-100 (NDX) futures rose over 1% Tuesday, narrowly missing the record high $22,425 hit Dec. 17, according to data source TradingView, a sign that might embolden bitcoin 
 bulls because t… [+859 chars]
